attributes.action: 17.4 Million voters demand Government deliver a clean break Brexit from the EU
attributes.background:
In 2016 the people of this country overwhelmingly voted to leave the EU, since then there have been many attempts to thwart the will of the people.
M.P.s must remember they are the servants of the people and should deliver on what was the largest democratic vote in this country.
BREXIT NOW

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "a clean break Brexit". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
